daily_plan_req: 1. Wake up and go for a morning run at the park at 5:30am 2. Attend morning classes at Oak Hill College from 8am to 12pm 3. Study at the library from 1pm to 4pm 4. Exercise in my room before dinner at 7pm.
name: Wolfgang Schulz
learned: Wolfgang Schulz is a student at Oak Hill College studying chemistry and a student athlete. He is very dedicated to both his academics and his sport.
currently: Status: Wolfgang Schulz is excited to continue exploring the village with his new friends and engage in community activities. He is looking forward to meeting Tamara at the farmers' market on Saturday morning and participating in various events such as music jam sessions at the village hall. Wolfgang is eager to immerse himself in the community and learn more about the village's history and culture.
lifestyle: Wolfgang Schulz goes to bed around 9pm, awakes up around 5am, eats dinner around 6pm.
living_area: the Ville:Dorm for Oak Hill College:Wolfgang Schulz's room
